xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: githubimporter.sourcetype.title=Source Type githubimporter.sourcetype.hint=This can be URL or File. (Note: Internet access is required for URL source) githubimporter.sourcetype.url=URL githubimporter.sourcetype.file=FILE / DIRECTORY githubimporter.source.url.title=URL githubimporter.source.url.hint=URL to the git repository. (e.g. https://github.com/Haxsen/TestRepo.wiki.git) githubimporter.source.file.title=Path githubimporter.source.file.hint=Path to the zip file / directory. Zip files must have a "zip" extension (file name ending in .zip). (e.g. /home/myuser/path/to/folder or /home/myuser/path/to/file.zip or E\:\\path\\to\\folder-or-zip) githubimporter.parent.title=Parent Page githubimporter.parent.hint=All of the imported pages will be created under this parent page. githubimporter.authcode.title=Authentication Code githubimporter.authcode.hint=(Required for private repository) This can be oauth / token / password used for authentication. githubimporter.username.title=Username githubimporter.username.hint=(Required for password only) The username used for authenticating with password. githubimporter.convertsyntax.title=Convert to Default Syntax githubimporter.convertsyntax.hint=The syntax of the pages will be converted to the Default Page Syntax which is set in Syntaxes (Administration). githubimporter.createhierarchy.title=Create hierarchy of pages githubimporter.createhierarchy.hint=Create the pages hierarchically according to their level defined in Sidebar (if exists). githubimporter.validation.parent=Parent page already exists. Please specify a new parent. githubimporter.job.info=A job for the import has started. Please wait until it has completed. githubimporter.job.complete=Import completed. githubimporter.job.error=An error has occurred during the import. Check the Job log for more information. githubimporter.validation.required=(Required) githubimporter.button.import=Import
